title: (x) Photography - ACME Carplates {Metadox}
content: AF Carplates, from ACME Fonts. You can buy it off [type.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110141854/http:/www.type.co.uk/), but the purchase link on the [ACME Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110141854/http:/www.acmefonts.net/) site seems broken.
author: metadox

comments.content: It seems you also can get it at [Plazm Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110141854/http:/www.plazm.com/fonts/catalog/catalog.asp) without the stencil one.
